price: Kwa kuzua tu mnataka miungu mingine badala ya Mwenyezi Mungu?
footnotes: Si mnazua uwongo tu ulio wazi kwa haya myatendayo, kwa kuwa mnamuabudu asiye kuwa Mwenyezi Mungu? Na si mnataka kuzua uzushi huu bila ya udhuru wowote ila kupenda kwenu tu?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
